interviewExperience: The interview process at Google was intense but fair. I appreciated the thoroughness of the technical questions and the time given to think through each problem. The interviewers were also friendly and provided helpful feedback on my performance.

comments.commentText: I agree with the review, Google is definitely a great company to work for.
I have also had a positive experience with Google's interview process.
I would love to work at Google, they have a great company culture.

interviewExperience: I found the interview experience at Amazon to be somewhat stressful. The interviewer asked a lot of hypothetical questions and it was hard to give a clear answer. The interviewer seemed to be looking for a specific answer rather than evaluating my thought process.

comments.commentText: I have also had a similar experience with Amazon's interview process. It was quite stressful.
I heard from my friends that Amazon's interview process is quite tough.
I would suggest preparing well before going for an interview at Amazon.

interviewExperience: The interview process at Facebook was very well-organized and efficient. The interviewer asked a lot of data-related questions that I found interesting and challenging. The overall experience was positive and I received an offer shortly after.

comments.commentText: Facebook is definitely a company that values its employees and provides great opportunities for growth.
I have also heard great things about Facebook's interview process.
I would recommend Facebook to anyone looking for a great place to work.
